description:
Only a short walk to the old city center and close to several of Ghent's beautiful parks.

There is parking near the house and bike rental options.

Although the house is located in a very vivid area of town, you can enjoy the peacefulness and quietness at all times as the rooms are located in the back of the house, with a view of the large garden.

The space
I'm a single mother of two (newborn twins) and currently renting out a part of the house to cover cost of the ongoing renovations of this 19th century house.

Although still ongoing, most renovation works are finished but the bathroom is still very basic and the hallway needs new paint. Nevertheless it's a charming old house in the typical Belgian style.

Want to stay for a weekend midweek or longer period in one of the most beautiful cities in Belgium ?

We offer you a furnished studio with fully equipped kitchen and bathroom. All this located in a historic building in the heart of the old town.

The studio is ideal for 2 persons, but can also be used for a family with 2 little children (up to 12 years old)

Cleaning at the end of your stay

description:
Authentic, idyllic villa for groups of up to 30 people.
Edville home is perfect for family trips, reunions with friends and family and company outings.
Recently renovated with beautiful garden at 5km from the historical centre of Ghent.

The garden has a wellness complex.
There is a sauna, swimming pond and hot water bath.

There is on-site parking for 12 vehicles.

The villa is always for 1 group only.

Catering is possible on request.
Edville Home is not the place for parties!

The space
Our villa was built in 1946 in the good old days and you can see that. Everywhere you will find beautiful original elements such as the parquet and the marble floors, the murals, ...
It is a very charming location.

There are 7 bedrooms with all modern conveniences.
There are 3 bathrooms with in total 5 showers.
Up to 30 people can sleep in a good bed with fresh sheets.

description:
Central though quiet location. Spacious studio on upperfloor. Nice view from kitchen onto garden and park.Historical centre just round the corner.

The space
The studio consists of two large airy , bright rooms on the topfloor of our house.
The kitchen-dining area overlooks our garden and the adjoining park. Next to it is a (to be fair) small bathroom with shower. The bedroom is on the streetside. It is very spacious. There s a foldable guestbed in case of three persons.
There is television, a desk and free Wifi.
Towels and bedlinnen are provided. Breakfast on demand. Free tea and coffee. We also provide guides and maps to the city.
The studio is located in a quiet street near the city centre. The castle is a five minute walk. The studio is two flights of stairs up but we ll insist and carry your luggage upstairs. All part of the service.
Filtered Brita water and local beers are offered as a warm welcome.
Free coffee & tea.

Hello welcome in Belgium / Ghent :)

Etienne and I live in the city centre of Ghent, in an old monastry. From our house it's only 10 minutes walking to the old center or the St-Baafscathedral, one of the famous 3 towers of Ghent.
Ghent has a central location in Flanders. Antwerp and Brussels at 50 km and Bruges at 30 km. All cities are easy to reach by train.

We can offer you a room with double bed, (+baby bed), internet, and a private bathroom. In your room you'll find everything you need: towels, soap, coffee, tea, water.

description:
A white house on a quiet street in a medieval quarter, Number 11 offers private accommodation in the fascinating historical town of Gent. Two self-contained units* - '11 Apa Above' and '11 Studio below' - can be booked together or separately. Your studio is on the ground floor.

The space
Prefer your own independent place in town?

Come and stay with us : we offer you a charming studio with bedroom, bathroom, kitchenette & small patio on the ground floor of a 18th century house, right in the middle of Gent's historic center of 'Patershol' : an exciting and cosy neighbourhood, little alleys, medieval streets and castle, a choice of 250 kinds of beer, surprising cultural walks, unique restaurants, sauna and a nightshop, all just next door.

More info : Lonely Planet Belgium and Luxembourg June 2010 - pag 166

Guest access
The studio is on the ground floor and completely individual.

- 10' biking to historic city center
- city park, supermarkets, night shop, public transport... within walking distance
- easy access to motorways E17 and E40

The space
The spacious guest room is located on the 1st floor next to the shared bathroom.

-lots of daylight (morning sun)

-working desk
-lots of storage space

description:
A beautiful house in the historical hart of Ghent! Sint-Ivo is located in one of the top residential neighbourhoods of Ghent: the cosy, peaceful prinsenhof with it's beautiful oak trees and the lively vibrating city just one streetcorner away!

The space
Sint-Ivo is a 3 level house. -1: bathroom, 0: entrance hall, +1: 2 bedrooms, +2: living room, dining area, kitchen and buro. There are about ten to twelve steps between every floor. So very small staircases. :)

Guest access
The whole house is yours! :)
And the neighbors are sweet enough to let you park your bikes in their storage room…and NO, you are not allowed to use their garden!

Other things to note
The city of Ghent asks a tourist tax of 3 euro per night per person. The tourist tax is not included in the price listed on airbnb! This tax has to be paid cash on site.

description:

Comfortable bedroom in a modern, light and spacious apartment, with all necessary facilities such as a comfortable bed, television and WiFi.

You have access to a shared bathroom. Towels are available. You also have free access to a shared living room, kitchen and terrace. In the kitchen you can make use of the fridge, coffee maker, plates and cutlery. Cooking a full meal in the kitchen is not possible.

A full breakfast can be served on request (10 euros p.p.).

The apartment is situated in Ghent city centre. Historical sights, restaurants and shops are located within walking distance.

The apartment is situated in the immediate proximity of tram- and busstand. The nearest train station is Ghent Dampoort (walking distance, 10 minutes).

description:
How about staying in the heart of the old city of Ghent? Rolling over the street for the best morning coffee? In a small but cosy duplex apartment, with most of one floor for you?
Live like a local !

The space
The two floor apartment (80 m2 in total) is small but cosy, and part of a medieval house dating back to 1490 ! (you can see its front on the images). You get the upper floor/bedroom to yourself and I'm working and sleeping downstairs (when I'm home). For couples, 'full privacy' might be an issue, as there is no door separating the two floors, yet the room itself is L-shaped and the bed is behind this 'L'.
The bedroom floor is under the roof, a bit like an attic, has a couple of windows, no curtains (there are covers to make the room darker, but not totally dark), a double bed and a double floor mattress if needed.
Strangely so for a place in the center: the appartement is very quiet because we're on the back side of the house.

description:
Nice apartment, less than 2 km from the historical center of Ghent. Superb view (sunset!) from the 12th floor (one of the highest of Ghent).
Free parking (which is very rare in Ghent).
Direct access from/to the motorways avoiding the city traffic jams and anyhow very quiet.
Old fashioned 70-ties apartment with spacious living room with parquet floor and separate income and kitchen.

The space
Enjoy the sunny view on the city of Ghent.

There is a spacious living room with a sofa, unfolding in a double bed, sitting corner and a dining area (table and chairs). The fully equipped kitchen (dishwasher, oven, microwave, expresso machine, toaster, water cooker) and the bathroom (with washing machine) are separate and of course there are the sunny terrace (10.5 by 1.3m) and the great view (although we cannot guarantee the sun). Currently however, the terrace is hardly useable due to the scaffold (smoking a sigaret on it is still possible).

I live there with my playful and sweet cuddly cat, Molly.

The city of Ghent taxes each guest older than 18 for 2,83 euro per day per person. This extra city tax has to be payed cash at the end of your stay.

The room has WIFI included and a television in the living room

description:
This is a newly renovated corner apartment in the historic centre of Ghent. The spacious two floor app with tons of light is situated above one of the nicest coffee bars of Belgium, it’s the perfect spot to start your day.
FREE BREAKFAST (coffee, juice, croissant) every morning!!
Flexible self check- in after 3pm.
Bicycle storage available in the ground floor garage, underground public car park nearby (150m). 20m from the central train station, the perfect base to explore Gent and other cities!

The space
You enter this recently renovated apartment through the garage. There are stairs to the first. At the first floor there is an other door with key lock. The stairs behind this door lead to the actual apartment.
At the second floor you can find the living room with high quality sound system and television and quite a basic kitchen. Fridge, microwave / oven and dishwasher are available. It’s a nice, welcoming, open space with tons of daylight.

description:
Stay at the 17th century house of graphic artist Gaby De Schepper in the historical heart of Ghent, “Patershol”, one of Belgium’s gourmet hotspots. The Duplex Apartment accommodates up to 6 persons. Free WIFI, private bath, toilet.

The space
Minimum reservation for 2 nights required.

The ultra quiet Duplex Apartment room on the second floor can accommodate up to 6 persons. The spacious room of roughly 80 sq meters provides a view over the 3 towers that dominate the Ghent skyline as well as the medieval Gravensteen castle. The room is furnished with two king-size beds, 2 single beds, a private bathroom with bath tub and a kitchen, ideal for longer stays.
The room is equipped with central heating, cable TV and WIFI internet access.

Breakfast is in the room, bread is served every morning by the host.

description:
Cozy whole apartment with breakfast. It is located in a quiet neighborhood, just 20 min from the center with public transportation.

There are two cats in the house, so please be aware of any cat allergies.

The space
Cozy whole apartment with 2 bedrooms located in a quiet neighborhood, self-service breakfast is included.

Each space of the apartment represents a specific style, continue reading to know more.

The first bedroom has a king-size bed (180cm), in Greek style which combines the typical white\blue color with authentic bamboo decoration.

description:
Your perfect retreat in a marvelous city. Plus we offer you what not many airbnb's in Ghent can offer:
- Beautiful and spacious villa located in the Arts District of Ghent
- About 10 minutes by foot from the famous Van Eyck expo and the historic centre
- Amazing garden with lounge set + BBQ
- Free car parking available on our driveway! (Up to 3 cars)
- You will be able to self check-in yourself upon arrival.

The space
Villa Pater is a gem with a unique history. It was built in 1904 as a weekend stay by Edmond Paternotte, a stonemason whose family imported the famous Belgian blue-stone imported from Hainaut for centuries.

The family has worked on several famous monuments in Ghent, from St. Peter's Abbey to the Palace of Justice.

Moreover, Edmond Paternotte has carved several artistic tombstones in the cemetery Campo Santo, the Pere Lachaise of Ghent. As a good Belgian, he was also a brewer.

description:
If you are searching for a relaxing stay close to beautiful Ghent, then you will love this peaceful place!

The space
The studio is fully renovated and located in the green surroundings of Ghent (8 km of the city center).

It is equipped with a double bed (140 cm.), couch, dinner table, kitchenette (with fridge), washing machine and a separate toilet and shower. The studio has its own entrance so you can enter and leave with your own key. The studio is 30m2.

There is a supermarket (10 min. walk), good restaurants, a delicious bakery (7 min. walk) and public transport (5 min. walk to the tram or bus stop). Ample parking space available on the street as well.

We highly recommend our place if you are working in the area for a few weeks (University of Ghent, Merelbeke, Technologiepark, etc.) and would like a private, clean and peaceful place to stay.

In immediate distance, you will also find lovely biking and walking routes

description:
Renovated in January '18!
This apartment, built in 1864, is located in the very heart of Ghent: the Ajuinlei, the street with Parisian allure, close to all the most beautiful spots in Ghent. You can expect incredible views from the terrace over the Lys canal.
The place is 75m² and although in the very center of Ghent, it is amazingly quiet. Large Hot Tub/Jacuzzi for 2 in the bathroom.
Opera: 150m
Graslei: 310m
Kouter square: 180m
Koophandel Square: 65m
Restaurants: 1m
Aula & Het Pand: 200m

The space
The apartment has a beautiful hard wooden floor, very high ceilings, kitchen with a lot of equipment and dishwasher, very large bedroom, and a bathroom with a Whirlpool bad. On the terrace you will find place for up to 4 persons. Feel free to water the many herbs and flowers.

Views from the terrace and windows in the living room:
- The tower of the Belfry with the golden dragon
- The tower of the St Baafs

description:
M/S Carpe-Diem, "Seize-the-Day", is a barge built in 1951. The ship is moored in the old docklands of Ghent and has been transformed into an exceptional, eco-friendly home.
The ship's deck house has been completely renovated into a comfortable, modern studio of 30 square meter.  The deck house accommodates max. 2 people, with a living/bed room, kitchen, separate bathroom with toilet and shower, as well as a washing machine and tumble dryer. Ideal for tourists and expatriate professionals.

The space
The ship, with registration n° 0600465, was purchased from a retired skippers couple in 2014.  The vessel had always been used to transport goods (e.g., wheat, steel rolls, etc.).  The ship measures 39,10 meter long by 5,05 meters wide.  It is powered by a still functional 268 kW Cummins Marine diesel engine.
​

description:
Our charming house at the waterfront is near to the city center of Ghent. You'll enjoy the vibrations of the city but also the tranquility of the neighborhood and our spacious garden, which makes it ideal for families with children. Couples will be delighted when they discover the romantic suite and the different terraces. Thanks to the sliding window in the bathroom there is even a possibility to take a bath outside.

The space
On the first floor we have a living room, a dining room and a kitchen next to the garden. In front of the garden there is a terrace and at the end of the garden there is a wellness porch (with sauna).
On the second floor we have a master bedroom with two terraces and a bathroom.
On the third floor there are two smaller rooms (one with a single bed + mattress and one with a sofa bed, possible to make 2 singles or 1 double bed) and a little bathroom with a shower. On each floor there is a toilet at your proposal.

description:
Een gerenoveerd authentiek historisch huisje (beluik-huisje) van 1862 in het centrum van Gent. Alle toeristische hoogtepunten zijn op wandelafstand. Rustig gelegen met een binnentuin, waar het gezellig is om te vertoeven.

The space
Autovrij plein, geen gratis parkeerplaats bij de woning.

Gent Centrum is autovrij geworden en publiek parkeren is duur.
Op minder dan 100m van uw huis: de ondergrondse garage "De Reep" – ongeveer 55€ voor een weekend

Een andere mogelijkheid is gratis parkeren op de P&R-parking:
P&R - Antwerpse Steenweg 956 - 9040 Oostakker (Gent).
Daar kan u dan bus 18 nemen naar "Gent Centrum" en u kan de busbestuurder vragen waar u moet afstappen, dichtbij de Lange Boomgaard 76, waar uw huisje zich bevindt.

Guest access
Volledige woning - 3 verdiepingen. 100% privé

Other things to note
Het huis heeft een trap naar de eerste en tweede verdieping.

The space
The apartment has recently been fully renovated. It’s 90m2, there are 6 rooms: the study, living, kitchen, bedroom, guest room and bathroom. There are two toilets (both separate from the bathroom). The apartment is on the 6th floor of a 7 story building, so the view is great and you can enjoy a beautiful sunset in the evening.

description:
A cozy and sunny room with a double bed and an ensuite bathroom. My house is located by the river Scheldt in the outskirts of Ghent.

I offer you: a good bed, a private bathroom, wifi, towels, a hairdryer, a fridge, a smart TV, coffee/tea, blackout curtains...

And a big smile from me ;-)

The space
The room is fully furnished and equipped with all basic amenities with a smart TV. The room has a separate bathroom. You will also find a fridge in the room!

There are blackout curtains in the room so you can enjoy sleeping in for a long time!

There is free parking in the street.

Guest access
Toilet? You will find your private toilet in the hallway.

Ingrid and Luc have two luxury apartments for rent above their gallery. The apartments are situated in a fully restored nineteenth century house.
If you are a couple, a solo adventurer or someone who's travelling for work... our apartments are perfect!

The space
Luc and Ingrid Mestdagh-Meyvaert, who run Atelier Mestdagh, the oldest stained glass studio of Ghent, have two luxury apartments for rent above their gallery. The apartments are situated in a fully restored nineteenth century house. They each have a size of 50 m2 and are provided with all necessary conveniences and with design furniture.
Each apartment has a built-in kitchen with dining area (table with 4 chairs), a sitting corner, a fireplace, a toilet, a bedroom with double bed, a shower and a washing table.

description:
Our place is in an area next to the city center, in a neighborhood that was working-class, then multicultural and is being gentrified by young families who escape the high prices of the center (new park, new buildings, art gallery, museum). Note that this is not a fancy tourist area, but rather a neighborhood where one can get a authentic feel of living in Flanders. We love cooking and guests can join. We speak Dutch, French, English, German, Russian, Ukrainian, Greek, Italian and Spanish.

The space
We live in a simple house, we used to use the room for airbnb only, but now we use it as a work space during the week and offer it to guests on other days or when we don't need it. Please note that the room is on the 3rd floor, access via stairs which can be quite steep. It has been completely renovated. We have a double bed/couch in it, and an extra matress, if needed. The room is spacious and light and you can use the whole house, eg. kitchen, terrace with bbq etc.<

description:
Volledig vernieuwd, historisch pand van 1551. Ruim (110 m²)appartement met zonnig terras, ingericht met passie voor interieur. Gelegen vlakbij het Gravensteen-kasteel, St. Baafskathedraal met Lam Gods (Altarpiece), Korenmarkt, ... ideaal voor cultuur, shopping, restaurants, bars , .... Alles op loopafstand.
Heel leuk adres om te vertoeven voor vakantie of werk , combinatie van rust en stad.

The space
Gezellige leefruimte met zonnig terras - volledig uitgeruste keuken (Nespresso-koffiezet !). Vanuit de leefruimte mooie gang naar de 2 slaapkamers en badkamer met ligbad/douche. Cosy TV-kamer met slaapbank 140 cm (= derde slaapkamer). High-speed Wifi en Sonos-geluidsinstallatie.
Handdoeken, lakens , shampoo en zeep zijn voorzien.
Appartement is zeer rustig (en toch pal in het historisch centrum)!

Het appartement is volledig ter beschikking van de gasten en is gelegen op het tweede verdiep (brede trap).

description:
Studio Edville Gent biedt verschillende studio's aan in twee verschillende gebouwen. Gelegen aan het water in het kunstkwartier van het gezellige Gent. In de studio is een keukentje aanwezig met alle basisbenodigdheden, een badkamer met douche en toilet. Er is telkens een dubbelbed (160 cm) en een fouton met twee matrassen aanwezig. We voorzien beddengoed (100% linnen) en handdoeken. Het historische centrum ligt op 25 minuten wandelen. Dit is dé ideale plek om Gent te verkennen!

The space
- klein keukentje aanwezig met waterkoker, kookplaat, frigo, servies, bestek, glazen, koffie, ...
- eettafel met 2 stoelen en 2 bankjes
- zetel/fouton met salontafel (de zetel is omvormbaar tot 2 volwaardige bedden)
- dubbelbed (160 cm) gelegen op de mezzanine
- badkamer met douche, toilet en lavabo
- kledingkast met hangers

description:
If you like to stay in the city, but at the same time have a quiet place to reside, then this is for you.
You can go to the center of Ghent on foot, by tram or bus.
The studio is very private. Own entrance to the street and has a nice terras in the garden. Own bathroom and kitchenette.

The space
The studio is located on the ground floor of the house that is communicating with the main house through the garden. So it is cosy and private. With own entrance, bathroom and kitchenette. No stairs. Bed is 140/200.

Guest access
You have your own terras in front of the studio.
The rest of the garden is usable on invitation

Other things to note
In my place I only use bio-products to clean, to build, to eat. So I keep the house vegetarian and without smoking. You can use the garden to smoke if you like.

description:
Set within 2 km from the historical center of Ghent, B³ Bed & Breakfast Boat provides guest cabins with a private terrace and free access to wireless internet. The Belfry of Ghent, the Korenlei, Korenmarkt Square and the Castle of the Count are all within a 15-minute walk.

The furnished cabins comprise a seating area and a flat-screen TV. Free coffee and tea facilities as well as a fridge are available. A shower, towels and free toiletries come as a standard in the bathroom.

Other things to note
A boat is not always easy to access for all people...

Spacious and bright room in the heart of Ghent. You have an adjoining bathroom with a shower, sink and toilet. Our bright and green home is a perfect base for wandering around in the most beautiful city, Ghent. We deliver you the best addresses and the most beautiful places. description:
Our house, completely loft-like renovated in 2017, is situated in a quiet historic neighborhood in the lovely city of Ghent. With my 2 young daughters (5 and 7 years) our house is baby/kids-friendly, and it's a great place to live: 200m² of living area, close to the city center, but still easy to travel to other places. We don't have a garden, but a big roof terrace, a park with a play ground 25m away, good access to public transport, ...

The space
I bought this house a couple of years ago, and renovated the outside of it like it used to be in the 19th century. The inside was turned around completely.

Downstairs:
- bathroom
- toilet
- kids bedroom (2 small beds)
- kids bedroom (2 foldable beds + 1 baby bed) / study room

Level 1:
- living room + dining room + kitchen

Level 2:
- master bedroom (double bed, Tempur mattresses!)
- bathroom

The house is being renovated bit by bit. I go for white, wood and a lot of light.

We are a 20 minute walk to the Gravensteen (center of town) or a 5 min bus ride. The neighborhood is quiet, with ample (paid) street parking (2-3 euros per 24H) paid by bank card. Have a cup of coffee on the balcony, while watching the bikers passing by. The #3 bus is behind our block. After a long day exploring Gent, relax with a movie on our projector!

The space
We are on the 3rd floor, there is an elevator up to our place. The kitchen is fully stocked with pots and pans and all the utensils you'll need to cook a delicious meal! We have a dishwasher too for the aftermath.
Please enjoy any of the food products or spices that are in our cabinets.
We provide coffee, tea and sugar. There is a projector in the living room, enjoy Netflix/YouTube or DVD’s from our Apple TV and PS3, no cable TV provided.
Our place has balconies on the front side of the building and the back. 2 of the 3 bedrooms have balcony access.

description:
Deze centraal gelegen accommodatie is smaakvol ingericht. Volledig nieuw! Veel comfort. Super gezellig. Volledig uitgeruste keuken. Ook een leuk tuintje. Waar je gebruik van kunt maken. Is privé voor de huurder. Je kan er veilig je fietsen plaatsen.

Guest access
Tram 4 & 1 komen van het station. Halte korenmarkt of de kouter. Beide heel dichtbij het huisje. De turrepoortsteeg is een doodlopend straatje. Het is het laatste huisje op je linkerkant. Heel zonnig. Je kan met geen auto in het steegje.
Als je met de fiets bent kan je deze binnen in het binnentuintje plaatsen.

Parking nabijgelegen: Sint-Michielsparking (23 euro per dag, zondagen 4euro)

We werken niet met een locker. Dus we verwachten de gasten op vaste uren.

description:
Eerst en vooral: welkom in Gent. Wil je de stad op een andere manier ontdekken en mag het allemaal net iets spannender en avontuurlijker zijn in een uniek kader? Dan nodig ik je graag uit op woonboot Luctor; een Deens vrachtschip uit 1928.

The space
Een boot is net iets anders dan een huis. Eerst en vooral zijn er bijzonder veel trappen en opstapjes. Houd hier zeker rekening mee als je niet goed te been bent. De 2 slaapkamers zijn gemakkelijk bereikbaar. Indien je gebruik wenst te maken van de derde slaapkamer, dan bespreek je dit vooraf met mij.

Je bent niet alleen op een boot. Ik tracht ongewenste bezoekers zoals spinnen en muggen zoveel mogelijk buiten te houden maar weet dat die heel graag op en rond de Luctor hangen.

De boot zelf ligt op een rustige waterstraat. Je zal dus geen last hebben van schommelingen.

Lovely 1 bedroom studio right in the city center of Ghent with a view of the Opera house. Located at 250m from the historical center of Ghent and a 15 minute walk from the central station.

The space
The apartment is located right in the city center right across the Opera of Ghent! It is easily accessible with public transport. If you walk 2 minutes through the shopping street you will find yourself standing between 2 of the iconic church towers of Ghent. Important to note is that the apartment is on the fourth floor without an elevator.

Guest access
The whole apartment is yours! You will have access to a spacious living room with a nice couch, and lots of light. There is also a big table where you can work or have breakfast. PS: don't forget to check the fridge for a nice little surprise!

description:
Our house is situated in a quiet, green, car-free street. We have a little garden and roof terrace. In summer time children play outside and there's a unique atmosphere. We have lot's of supermarkets nearby, a superbe café where you can have a drink and something to eat. It's a 15 min. walk to get to the city centre. There's a bus nearby or bikes at your disposal. Our house is perfect for couples or families. We only rent the place when we're out ourselves so you have to live with our stuff ;-)

The space
Our house has everything you need: a good kitchen, a nice livingroom, a piano, tv, a bathroom with bath and rainshower, a little garden with bbq, swings for the children, toys for children, bikes to use, a quiet roof terrace and a little library.
We have a cat, Winnie. She likes to be fed, but she can stay outside in spring/summer/autumn if you have a cat allergy.

Guest access

er zijn meerdere appartementen in het huis en nachtlawaai kan absoluut niet worden getolereerd.

In 2015 we bought this charming house for our student daughters. It is a very atmospheric place. Both, inside and outside. The house is one of the 19 small houses of 'Koer Langerode. Koer Langerode is a very quiet and pedestrian lane in the Ekkergemstraat. We ask our guests to respect this peace.
There are two student bicycles with which the center can be reached very quickly. Nature (Blaarmeersen Park + Beach) is also nearby!

The space

The space
This apartment on the first floor consists of two rooms, separated by a small corridor: a spacious bedroom with a double bed and modern bathroom (shower + toilet), and a sunny living room with a sofa bed where another two people can sleep. - Easily reachable by car with plenty of parking solutions.

This is a newly renovated corner apartment in the historic centre of Ghent. The spacious two floor app with tons of light is situated above one of the nicest coffee bars of Belgium, it’s the perfect spot to start your day.
FREE BREAKFAST (coffee, juice, croissant) every morning!!
Flexible self check- in after 3pm.
Bicycle storage available in the ground floor garage, underground public car park nearby (150m). 20m from the central train station, the perfect base to explore Gent and other cities!

The space
You enter this recently renovated apartment through the garage. There are stairs to the first. At the first floor there is an other door with key lock. The stairs behind this door lead to the actual apartment.
At the second floor you can find the living room with high quality sound system and television and quite a basic kitchen. Fridge, microwave / oven and dishwasher are available. It’s a nice, welcoming, open space with tons of daylight.

description:
Op een boogscheut van gent centrum, in de bruisende Brugse poort is een kleine autovrije straat. Daarin bevindt zich ons huis met 2 slaapkamers. Het is een zeer licht huis met veel ramen en glas. Het speelterrein voor de kinderen is onze kleine tuin en de straat.
Makkelijk bereikbaar via de hoofd ingangswegen rond gent, doch geen lawaai in huis of in de straat van het verkeer.
op 15 minuten wandelafstand van het centrum van gent.

Het is een open huis met een open keuken. Op de gelijkvloers is er voorts een living met tv, radio en een platencollectie. Er is Wi-Fi aanwezig.
Op de eerste verdieping is de kinderkamer en de badkamer met inloopdouche, toilet en wasmachine. Met een schuifdeur kan je naar de 2 de verdieping waar de ouder slaapkamer is. Buiten hebben we een klein tuintje met planten en een tafel met stoelen.

Guest access
De gasten hebben het gehele huis voor hen

Here are some of the basics about your room and our house: your private room is located on the first floor near the bathroom and is actually the master bedroom of the house. description:
My apartment is situated in the centre of Ghent. It’s on the ground floor. It’s very close to a supermarket, bars, restaurants.

From January 2020 there is a low emission zone in Ghent. Old diesel cars are not allowed. More information on lez2020.gent .

Underground parking “Reep” is nearby.
You can park for free in the Zuiderlaan and take a free shuttle from there to the city.
Or P+R Gentbrugge and take a tram

Other things to note
Having parties and leaving a lot of waste is not allowed.
It is absolutely not allowed to be present with more guests than booked. Even if friends don't stay the night.
Waste does not belong on the floor, but in the bin. Smoking inside is not allowed.
If glass breaks, please report this.

description:
- Gezellige woning in een afzonderlijk gedeelte van een karaktervol huis in het meest historische deel van Gent 'Het Patershol'
- Een grote comfortabele badkamer en apart toilet
- De woning is voorzien van veel natuurlijk licht en ondanks dat het zo centraal gelegen is, zeer rustig om te slapen!
- Voel je vrij om zelf te koken in de goed uitgeruste keuken met talrijke winkels in de buurt
- Gemakkelijke toegang tot alle openbaar vervoer
- U kan zelf inchecken bij aankomst

The space
Het huis is perfect gelegen om Gent te ontdekken!
Op slechts 3 min. wandelen van het middeleeuwse 'Gravensteen' en op 5min. wandelen van de Sint-Baafskathedraal, de Sint-Niklaaskerk, de Sint-Michielsbrug en ... het Lam Gods van de gebroeders Van Eyck!

Geniet van de pittoreske straatjes vol gezellige restaurants, populaire cafés en trendy bars, welkom in het Patershol!

De woning is gelegen in onze privé woning maar volledig afgezonderd

description:

Within 2 min walk, you have all the landmarks that Medieval Ghent has to offer; Graslei, Korenmarkt, the Castle of Counts, St Bavo's Cathedral, the Design museum and much more. terrace and Netflix for those You can enjoy the good weather on the terrace or have a cosy night inside, enjoying Netflix.

The space
The apartment is situated on the fourth floor and has 2 bedrooms with 2 double beds and a living area with a sofa bed. The clock window in the living area offers a great view on the Castle of Counts. The terrace offers an amazing view over historic Ghent.

Guest access
The entire apartment is accessible to guests.

Other things to note
The apartment is located in a car free zone, there are several underground parkings nearby.

description:
2 rooms on 1st floor of a charming villa in the green area around Ghent. We welcome 2 students for long stay or everybody up to 8 pers. There's 1 private bathroom+kitchen+laundry. Drongen is located very close to the city center: 20min by bus, 4 min by train to Gent-Sint-Pieters (train station at 2 km). The area is green, quiet and relaxing but still vibrant with Blaarmeersen recreation area/sport facilities/bike trails. Good access to Ghent, Bruges, coast and Brussels with E40 highway at 3 km.

The space
The rooms are located on the first floor of the villa with nice views. The 2 big private rooms are functionally furnished and a private bathroom is available for all guests. also a cosy kitchenette with fridge, microwave, 2 cooking plates.
Close to bus, train and highway.

description:
Hello everyone!

I welcome you to my home.

I am a painter and arts teacher.

My house:
The neighbourhood is quiet and close to the city centre of Ghent( 45 minutes walk or tram for 10 minutes) . There is place to park in my street (for free).

I offer you a quiet private bedroom with a double bed and a shared bathroom.

The price already includes city tax.

P.s. we have a rabbit.

Looking forward to meet you,
Sophie

The space
The bedroom is normal size and comfortable for two people.

Guest access
The bedroom and the bathroom.

description:
My house is is in the center of the city of Ghent. In a quiet neighborhood close to everything. There is also the possibility to Enjoy an evening meal And/or breakfast. I will make sure You’ll Enjoy Your stay! Requirements Will be taken in consideration and i’ll do everything in my power to achieve them.
Welcome!

The space
On the ground Floor there is the livingroom, kitchen and a toilet. On the first Floor there is the bathroom with shower, bath and toilet. You can get on the terras from the bathroom. On the second Floor is your bedroom. Everything but my own room is free to use by the guests.

Guest access
All But my bedroom are at Your disposal.

Other things to note
I live here too. I leave for work at 6:30 And get home around 16:30. Please don’t make too much noise between 23:00 And 6:30.
Thank you

description:
Nice apartment in the old city center close to the water and all the interesting medieval architecture.
The perfect spot to explore this beautiful city!
The space is very bright thanks to the many windows and high ceilings. It creates a cosy bohemien loft feeling.
There is a large terrace flooded with sunlight overlooking quiet interior gardens.
Private entrance and easy to park, bikes provided for guests at no extra charge.

The space
The bedroom has a comfortable double bed. There is an en suite bathroom that holds a rain shower, sink and separate toilet.
The living room has a cosy bohemien interior.

Here on airbnb and online on the web you will find all the info you need to contact us. May be interesting for you to contact us there first.
Search once on the web.
Occupancy taxes and fees is sadly a new tax of 6% imposed by our government, the rest is the Tourist Tax off 3€ a night, for each guest.

Well situated and quiet apartment, with shared terrace & air conditioning, just 200m across Gent-Dampoort railway station, Flixbus and Eurolines, and possible free parking on the station's parking lot.

Gent-Dampoort is the railway station closest to the city hall, (1km) and has direct trains to Antwerp, Bruges, Kortrijk, Lille Flanders (France), Ypres, and the coastal cities Ostend and De Panne. Weekdays direct train to Brussels at 07h47… Very easy for city trips to these cities.

Gay friendly.

You can grab a free coffee while cooking in the fully equipped kitchen or go out to one of the many restaurants within walking distance. The private terrace gives you the possibility to take a breath of fresh air.

Spacious living room with digital tv, dining table for 4.
Private kitchen, 2 bedrooms with king-size beds and a bathroom with bath.

description:
Farmhouse with magnific open view & heated swimming pool.
Nice place for a stay, you can enjoy open view and the nature, while you are close to the city Ghent, Bruges and Belgian coast!
We have 3 bedrooms (2 bedrooms with double bed; 1 bedroom with 4 single beds); 2 bathrooms, kitchen, diningroom & sofa. Big garden with trampoline, heated swimming pool, Swing, deadride, Weltevree outdooroven & BBQ.
Minimum stay : 2 weeks.
Period: between 16/07/2021 and 10/08/2021.

The space
Charmante hoevewoning met prachtig open zicht en verwarmd (30°) zwembad.
Onze hoeve is gelegen in de natuur, hier kom je werkelijk tot rust! Voordeel is wel dat je dichtbij Gent, Brugge & Belgische kust bent.
We hebben 3 slaapkamers (2 slaapkamers met dubbelbed ; 1 slaapkamer met stapelbed, bed & bedlade); 2 badkamers, keuken, leefruimte & sofa met tv (netflix). Grote tuin met verwarmd zwembad, trampoline, schommel , deadride, Weltevree pizza-oven & BBQ.

description:
Huize Maeterlinck is een prachtig gerenoveerd appartement in hartje Gent. Het maakt deel uit van een groter pand dat werd gerenoveerd met oog voor detail en waar verrassende elementen een eigenzinnig geheel vormen. Dit pand was het voormalige huis van de familie Maeterlinck. Gelegen in het autovrije gebied is dit de perfecte uitvalbasis om Gent te ontdekken. Op wandelafstand van Vrijdagmarkt, Korenmarkt, Graslei en het Gravensteen en toch in een zeer rustige wandelstraat, een absolute aanrader.

The space
Prachtig gerenoveerde Penthouse op de tweede verdieping, bestaande uit twee etages. De bovenste etage is een prachtige gerenoveerde zolder met een gerenoveerde doorgang met zeer ruime, smaakvol ingerichte slaapnissen met luxueuze bedden en badkamer. De eerste etage is zeer licht, comfortabel en bestaat uit een op maat gemaakte open keuken, en een zeer rustgevend zitgedeelte.

description:
Welcome to our little house in the suburbs of Ghent! We are expats who divide their time between two lovely cities: Uppsala (Sweden) and Ghent. When we are away, we decided to share our house with other travelers, who can enjoy a restful stay in the quiet suburbs and combine it with visiting the beautiful city of Ghent.

The space
The house has a spacious living room with dining table and a seating area. There are two bedrooms, each of them has a double bed. The bathroom has a bathtub and a shower. Of course, we also have a washing machine, as we know that traveling with kids sometimes involves a lot of laundry. Because we are a family with small kids, we have almost everything for little ones. There are toys, books (mostly in Dutch and Swedish), a baby chair, toddler bed and baby cot

Other things to note
The garden is a great area to play in, but because we are often away, it sometimes can look a bit like a jungle. Feel free to roam around,

description:
Welcome in our spacious apartment nearby the city centre!
Located nearby the historical centre of Ghent this is the perfect getaway for friends, colleagues, travellers and families.

The space
Our apt. is located in a quiet neighbourhood, close to the beautiful and famous ‘artsy’ cemetery Campo-Santo. Worth a visit!
The train station Dampoort and the historical city center are both within walking distance (10 minutes and 15 minutes).
There are plenty of shops, restaurants and bakery’s in the neighbourhood.

In short: You will find everything you need during your stay!

description:
www.boxinabox.be Home for expats / base for tourists...

A rural gift...
Create your quality-time yourself.
Open your box to have a great time in this Nature Reserve nearby the centre of Ghent.

The space
Independent and stylisch living 'box' inside the restaurated historical farm, with plenty of space, (inside and outside), animals, nature and things to discover.
Free use of kayak, bikes, bbq, darts, games,...
WIFI free

Guest access
Accesscode necessary to enter.

Hay wagon storeplace (50m²) and terrace (140m²) to share with other guesthouse and day-activities (seasonal)

Other things to note
Our lovely and always friendly dog Aïko will welcome you by bringing his ball to play...
Free Netflixaccount

description:
The space
The room is located in a charming guesthouse, surrounded with an oasis of tranquil atmosphere, only a 10 minutes bikeride away from the historic heart of Ghent .
The room is simple but warmly decorated, all with free WiFi.
The private bathroom has a shower, hairdryer, toiletries and fresh towels.
This guesthouse is family friendly! If asked in advance, the'll be happy to place a baby bed.
Guests can use a separate garden and complimentary bicycles.
There is a simple kitchenette availible with a microwave, coffee maker, refrigerator, and waterboiler..
(Fairtrade coffee and tea always available)

public transportation 3 minutes walk.

description: Spacious home with garden and  terrace. Big windows, lots of light. As cooking is our job we have a big kitchen with all facilities. A small bathroom, 3 bedrooms.  In the district of the old cotton harbour. 2 km away from the historic centre of Ghent. By tram its 10 min to the centre and 20 min to the Gent Sint Pieters train station. Free parking in the street. The neighbourhood has  grocery stores and some bars and places to eat.

description:
A private room with big windows at the 1st floor of a modern appartment in Ghent-centre. Everything you'll need you can find within 5 minutes walking distance. Public transportation trams, shops, restaurants and bars are literally around the corner. The very heart of the city center is at a 5 to 10 minutes walking distance. The room and appartement are very clean and inviting. An underground, safe parking space is available if needed. (max. car height 1m79, max. length 4m75.) With elevator.

The space
The room you'll be staying in is very clean. It has a double bed with clean sheets and there is a sofa. The cosy, spacious living room is also at your disposal. We will share that together, as goes for the bathroom and kitchen. The kitchen is practically new and fully equipped. Feel free to use anything at any time. description:
Looking for a unique place to stay in Ghent? Choose our place for contempory living in a completely refurbished authentic townhouse that dates back to the beginning of the 20th century.

Discover and enjoy the Ghent city life at walking distance.

Right across the city park 'Groene Vallei' (green valley), ideal for picknicks and only a breath away from 'Blaarmeersen' sports and recreation park.

Fresh linen and nespresso? We offer all the modern amenities that make you feel right at home.

The space
Our place has a master bedroom with ensuite bathroom (sleeps 2 - baby cot possible at request), and a large duplex room (sleeps 3) with ensuite shower and mezzanine. We have a normal sized extra bed for a child at your disposal should you need this. We have to say that the stairs in the duplexsuite are steep, as you can see in the pictures. The bedrooms are fitted with new quality beds.

The living room has an eco-leather sofa

description:
It is a beautiful bel etage near the center of Ghent. On the first floor there is a big kitchen with oven, microwave, fridge, dishwasher, washing and drying machine, cooking fire, all kind of kitchen material. There is a beautiful terras on the first floor where you can chill and hangout. There is a vintage 50s /60s living with tv, netflix, .... There are 3 rooms. There is a tram 30 meters from the house. 10 min by foot from the city center.

The space
You can use all the kitchen material, we also have a big freezer in the basement where you can store things. There is a big hallway to put your bike or other stuff

description:
De woning is volledig gerenoveerd, heeft een prachtige ligging in de scheldevallei, naast het kasteel van schelderode en is met smaak ingericht. Ze bestaat op het gelijkvloers uit een Inkomhal, berging, uitgeruste keuken met eettafel, salon, bureau en eetkamer, slaapkamer, badkamer met ligbad en afzonderlijk toilet. Op de eerste verdieping zijn nog twee slaapkamers, een afzonderlijk toilet en een badkamer met douche. De hoeve is vrijstaand en heeft een grote tuin.

The space
De woning is gelegen in de prachtige scheldevallei, het begin van de Vlaamse Ardennen, ideaal om te genieten van de natuur te voet of met de fiets.
De historische stad gent ligt op 15 min.

Guest access

description:
We have been living in Ghent for many years now and we love it.
Our neighbourhood is nice and quiet, at a very short walk from interesting musea, beautiful parks, good restaurants & bars, and a big movie theatre.
It is located at walking distance from the historic city centre, perfectly located and well-connected with all types of (public) transport.

We will give you any suggestions according to your preferences to make your stay an unforgettable one!
Come and visit our beautiful city Ghent!

The space
We can offer you a bedroom with adjacent private bathroom in our house, which is ideal for 2 people. Your space is located on the second floor of our house.
The private bathroom (with shower, toilet and sink) is located next to your bedroom.

description:
The Blue Room is located on the first floor. This is a very typical Flemish house so the stairs are very steep and narrow.
If you have had a few too many Belgian beers you could get to the ground floor very quickly!!!

I provide a safe environment for everyone.

After that, it’s just about having fun…!
I look forward to welcoming you…

Handdoeken, gels, body producten inbegrepen.

"rooftop studio" is een gezellige en ruime studio met zonning terras, gelegen in de 19de eeuwse gordel van Gent, met heel wat bartjes, restaurants, winkels,... nabij het historisch centrum.
Je slaapt er in een fijn ingerichte dakstudio dat uitkijkt op de Gentse torens. Het heeft een knusse slaapkamer verstopt achter een groot gordijn, een kleine kitchentte, een open badkamer en een verrassend zonnig terras. De loft is voor 2 personen met 1 tweepersoonsbed.

description:
The Leiecabin is located on a unique piece of land on the Leie in St-Martens-Leerne, a stone's throw from Ghent and even closer to St-Martens-Latem and Deurle, the most picturesque villages in East Flanders! The Cabin has a private sauna and hottub on firewood. We can provide boat trip with skipper or book an electric boat (no license needed) to discover the Leie.

Please note we also rent out a YACHT, on the ponton next door, these guest sometimes pass by to get on the boat, but not in your immediate privacy.

description:
Cosy room for 1 or 2 guests, hidden in a quiet and narrow street in the heart of the city centre. The room has a DOUBLE BED, but can be prepared with TWIN BEDS upon request (before 12:00 pm on check-in day). The en-suite bathroom is equipped with a shower, bath towels, shampoo and a hairdryer. Stunning view of St. Bavo's Cathedral. Suitable for couples or friends. You can also enjoy a buffet breakfast for only 12 € per person per day to pay at the reception, just let us know in advance.

The space
Our hotel is a little home right in the heart of the city. We have recently renovated the common areas downstairs based on our project for a "New Flandria Hotel", more connected to the city of Ghent. In our bar you can meet Betty Bijoux, a lady from the 20's who will be happy to serve you some good Belgian beers or strong Italian coffee : ) In our breakfastroom you can also enjoy a buffet breakfast for only 12 € per person per day to pay at the reception.

description:
Perfectly situated and recently renovated spacious townhouse in a quiet neighborhood at 15 min walk from Gent St-Pieters train station and 15 min walk from the historic city center. A direct tram connection gets you there even faster. There are two bikes available for you to explore the city.

The space
You have a separate bedroom on your own floor, with private toilet and bathroom with bathtub, rain-shower and sink. Showergel, shampoo and hairdryer are provided. The king size bed with Emma quality matras will provide for a relaxing sleep. Towels and bedlinen are provided.

Guest access
We will share the ground level: open dining area/breakfast bar/kitchen/living room and you have the possibility to use a modern, fully equipped kitchen. description:
Welcome to our house near the waterside in Ghent. We are situated in a quiet area with easy access to the city center and the train stations (tram stop is 1 minute away).

We offer towels, soap, and laundry service. In our kitchen you'll find coffee, tea, cooking herbs, olive oil, pots and pans, utensils. All are free to use.

This is a family-owned house with 2 Airbnb rooms.

The space
Ground Floor: living room, kitchen, toilet, and bathroom.
First Floor: we have 2 x Airbnb rooms available.
Second Floor: we have reserved the second floor as a private space.

This master bedroom has a private toilet and sink attached.

Guest access
All the common spaces and your own private room.

Bright spacious room in a newly renovated art deco house from the early 40's. Located in the heart of Ghent. You have a private kitchen + bathroom (shared w/ the 1 other airbnb-room) and we provide a set table so you've got a 'private restaurant' feeling. Set in a townhouse in the heart of historical Ghent, a 10-minute walk from the Belfry, St Bavo’s Cathedral and Gravensteen’s castle, you can find the Artist’s Loft. Located in an old ‘cité’ recently renovated by Monument services, and decorated with original works of art, this loft offers painting and drawing facilities as well as free WiFi. It features two levels with a seating area on each, and coffee and tea facilities, micro-wave and minibar on the top level.

The space
The loft comes with a private bathroom with shower, hairdryer, free toiletries and bathrobes. For breakfast, lunch or dinner guests can visit one of the many establishments in the immediate surroundings.

description:
M/S Carpe-Diem, "Seize-the-Day", is a barge built in 1951. The ship is moored in the old docklands of Ghent and has been transformed into an exceptional, eco-friendly home.
The ship's cargo hold has been renovated into a contemporary, loft-like residence of 65 square meter, with all modern comfort, including a heated outdoor pool with jet stream.
The cargo hold accommodates maximum 4 people, with two separate bedrooms with double beds.  Ideal for tourists and expatriate professionals.

The space
The ship, with registration n° 0600465, was purchased from a retired skippers couple in 2014.  The vessel had always been used to transport goods (e.g., wheat, steel rolls, etc.).  The ship measures 39,10 meter long by 5,05 meters wide.  It is powered by a still functional 268 kW Cummins Marine diesel engine.
​

description:
Je Kan ons vinden op de kunstenkilometer van Gent: het SMAK, MSK en de Bijlokesite (met o.a. KASK en STAM) liggen allemaal op dezelfde as. Het gebouw is een deel van de historie, met een architectuur en geschiedenis die we in zijn waarde laten.

Ons pand is gebouwd in opdracht van Laurent de Werchin. Van de gekende de Werchin. Een familie waarvan de stamboom te vinden is tot 1100NC. De bekendste daarvan Baron Pierre de Werchin Ridder aan het hof van Keizer Karel.

The space
Deze charmante kamer zit op het 2de verdiep en heeft een aangrenzende kamer. Origineel (1876) was dit één grote kamer met een deur in het midden zoals dat vroeger de gewoonte was. Deze deur hebben ze in de loop der jaren dicht gemetst. De ingangen van beide kamers zijn nu in de hall naast de ingang vannde badkamer.

beide kamers zijn ingericht als slaapkamer.

description:
Een heel stadswoning voor jullie alleen? Shelter7 is een moderne architecturale parel midden in het centrum van Gent. Een mix van brutalisme, minimalisme en Wabi Sabi.
De voorgevel bestaat uit een betonnen structuur, die de krijtlijn vormt van een oude afdruk. De vide brengt licht van buiten naar binnen. Een verrassende combinatie van 3 etages bestemd om elke gast tot rust te brengen. Oikofilie op zijn best.
Shelter7 is een B&E, een bed & experience, het biedt extra ervaringen op maat.

The space
Shelter7. Een inspirerende ruimte die Wabi Sabi uitademt en fungeert als rustpunt, een stilteoord binnen de bruisende stad. Een plek die je even naar een hoger niveau tilt en die jou en je gasten bijblijft, modern met een hoek af, een onafgewerkte cirkel van zenitude.

description:
Cosy studio hidden behind Ghent's greenest facade. Fully furnished for a short break or long stay in the heart of Medieval Flanders.

The space
Our studio has a private entrance, its own bathroom, an equipped kitchen, a dining space and a sleeping area. It has windows on both sides of the house so there is ample light at any time of the day. Wooden floors all over, give the room a cosy touch.
The kitchen is fully furnished, has a small fridge, microwace, coffee machine and water kettle. We provide coffee & tea, and some herbs for your cooking comfort.
The bathroom comes with fresh towels, has a toilet, bath tub & shower and sink. Close to the bathroom there are plenty of closets to store your clothes.
The dining area seats three, and a comfy chair will give you a space to sit back and relax.
The bed (160cm width) comes with high quality Auping matresses, is covered with a down duvet and fresh bed linnen.

Guest access

description:
Our apartment is situated close to the city center, with lots of busses stopping in front of the door and the Dampoort train station only 15 minutes walk away. The building is from 1940, and most aspects of our apartment are still original. Therefore it is quite important that you are considerate and treat our place with care :-)
The guest bedroom is all yours, the other places in the house are shared but we are often away in the daytime so you can enjoy plenty of privacy, also in the garden.

The space
The guestroom is situated in the middle of the apartment, therefore some people who are really light sleepers sometimes notice sound from the kitchen or doors opening and closing, mostly around the time when we get up to go to work. Most people seem to be ok with this though.

The bedroom is a kind of studio with its own lounge and dining table. Everything is quite close: a shop on the corner of the street, a park around the corner. From here you can just as well take a pleasant walk along the water and easily enter the city life. Welcome to Ghent!

The space
The studio is on the top floor, is a bright space with its own lounge, TV with google chrome, Tea and coffee is provided. Cutlery and plates + cups are also provided. The Mezannine has a double bed. There is a wardrobe with bed linen, extra duvet and pillows, towels and a hairdryer. The bathroom is one floor lower and can be shared with me (provided toiletries). description:
This bright and spacious apartment offers everything for a nice stay in the centre of Ghent! You will be at walking distance (only 10 mins) of the Korenmarkt and other hotspots in the beautiful city! Furthermore we have 1 double bed and 1 smaller double bed in a separate bedroom. The linen from "De Witte Lietaer" as well as the shampoo, soap, toilet paper and wifi are foreseen for every reservation. You will be able to park right next to the accommodation. Enjoy our beautiful city!

Other things to note
There is a television in the apartment, but there's only a Chromecast available. So no digital (cable) TV.

There are parking spaces in front of the building, would these be occupied, then there is a big parking across the building (50m).
Price: 0,50€ for 1 hour or 3€ for 24 hours, free after 19h (7PM) and before 9h (9AM) and free on Sundays.

description:
Modern en-suite bedroom, minutes from Sint-Pieters station. Public transport (train, bus, tram, taxi,...) in the immediate vicinity. Also close to the city center of Ghent. Enjoy the cool authentic shops such as Tierentyn mustard, the smallest house in Ghent is now a drinking place 't Galgenhuisje. Or taste a delicious Belgian beer in Het Bierhuis on the Waterkant. (Erasmus) Students are certainly welcome here. Studying can also be a bit of vacation. :)

The space
You will stay in a bedroom with a double bed (160cm) with private bathroom and desk. TV and WiFi (or network), small fridge, microwave, Nespresso and kettle available. Fan and portable air conditioner. Plates and cutlery, dishes are done by me. !!Kitchen itself can only be used for longer stays from 2 weeks!! Washing machine, dryer, drying rack, iron, washing products are all available for longer stays from 2 weeks.

Guest access
only access to private room, there is no common room.

description:
The Blue Room is located on the first floor. This is a very typical Flemish house so the stairs are very steep and narrow.
If you have had a few too many Belgian beers you could get to the ground floor very quickly!!!
This is a private home that I share with people from every corner of the globe.
I provide a safe environment for everyone.
I ask that every guest respects that this is a shared space and home.
After that, it’s just about having fun…!
I look forward to welcoming you…

Guest access
Check in is from 16:00. Check-out is by 11:00. There is a €5 fee per hour for either early check-in or late check-out. This fee is non-negotiable.

Extra person staying overnight must be asked for in advance with prior approval (before 18:00). The price is €35 a night per extra person, to be paid for in advance.

If you have a guest over for the night without prior approval, a €75 fine will be charged.

description:
Burgstraat 17 is an old Patrician house constructed in 1515. Later the house was split in 2 houses and became neglected for many years. In 2019 we started the renovation, with as only purpose, to keep the soul and respect the history and grandeur of the original house.
Its exceptional history, unique architecture and central position made it worth doing so.
Tears, joy and a lot of work resulted in the place where you are right now. We hope you enjoy and respect this place as much as we do.

The space
We created this apartment as a place of relaxation for ourselves. We are proud to share with you
1) Abundance of natural light
2) Authenticity and respect for the history
3) Comfort with subtle flavours of luxury and comfort
4) Personal well-being and relaxation

Other things to note
No breakfast, lunch or dinner services provided
Own linnen: -10€/booking
Own cleaning: -10€/booking

Ship ahoy!
Looking for a hostel that shows the spirit of Ghent? Somehow different, friendly, fun, but most of all relaxed?

It's not everyday you can be a pirate, you might as well go for it! Don't forget that land was only created to provide a place for boats to moor... You'll find the boat on a lazy canal just outside the historic centre, quiet, lush and green.

description:
Welcome to 'The Cover': new and charming hostel located in the middle of the historical center of Ghent. Located on the beautiful Vrijdagmarkt, the perfect spot to explore the historical, cultural and night life in Ghent. All facilities are available and free to use: kitchen, showers (6), washer and dryer, lockers, dining room, relaxation room, free WIFI. We are looking forward to welcome you!

The space
The hostel is a part of the multi-purpose bar 'The Cover'. Well-known in and around Ghent for his unique atmosphere. Grab a great Belgian beer at the bar, watch one of the many bands or dj's playing in the evening or just enjoy the amazing view from the terrace. Don't worry: the hostel is separated from the bar so you can still relax the silence and charm if you prefer so. All the major spots for sight-seeing, exploring, nightlife, culture or museums are just a walk away.

description:
Het huis dateert van 1740 en was origineel een jeneverbrouwerij. De studio staat los van de landelijke woning en is voorzien van alle nodige comfort en ruimte. After that, it’s just about having fun…!
I look forward to welcoming you…

Due to a temporary stay abroad we like to rent out our home to people like us, looking for a new environment. Our charming & bright home offers you ample space, 10-15 min cycling to the city center of Ghent & 5 min to a natural area

The space

description: Wij wonen in één van de leukste huizen in één van de leukste buurten van Gent. Gasten hebben de hele bovenste verdieping ter beschikking. Na 3 minuutjes wandelen ben je in het gezellige stadscentrum. Je proeft, voelt en ziet de sfeer van Gent van zodra je de deur uit bent. In onze wijk zijn er veel lekkere restaurants en gezellige koffiebars. Je kan ook een hele fijne graffitiwandeling doen (een plannetje geven we je mee) of lekker gaan uitwaaien in de Oude Dokken.

description:
Other things to note
As you might have guessed, our name was derived from the Old Saint-Elisabeth Beguinage just around the corner. If history is your thing, you've come to the right place. Our neighbourhood is also known as the 'holy corner' where you can find no less than three different churches close by. The Saint-Elisabeth church hosts Anglican services, whilst an Orthodox and Protestant church are only 5 minutes walking distance. Can't get enough of history? Make sure to head to the city centre for a visit to the 'Gravensteen', Ghent's medieval castle, situated at the edge of the bustling city centre. Fine dining, take-out, good coffee or a quick bite, all that and more can be found at walking distance.

description:
Heel gezellig huisje op het einde van een fantastisch beluikje. We hebben dit huisje gekocht in 2020 om onze studerende dochter in onder te brengen. Het is een idylisch plekje in Gent.

Goed gelegen op wandelafstand van Gent centrum en de Blaarmeersen. Delhaize om de hoek. Tram 2 passeert op 200m en brengt je binnen 10 minuten naar het centrum. De trappen zijn nogal steil, maar dat hoort bij de charme van dit 19e eeuwse huisje. Er is wifi aanwezig. We werken met een sleutelkastje

The space

description:
Renovated in 2021 guest house/studio with separate entrance and large shared garden.
For 1 or 2 guests.
In a quiet green suburb of Ghent 4 km from the city center.
At 2 km from nature reserve Bourgoyen-Ossemeersen.
Beautiful cycling routes in the area.
We have 2 free bicycles available for you.
Supermarket, bakery, butcher, ... within walking/cycling distance.
Bus and tram stop less than 1 km away.

The space
The residence is an outbuilding next to our own house. The interior walls are finished with clay. This gives it a warm and natural look where you can completely relax. The room is equipped with wall heating that you can control yourself with a thermostat.
The window on the south side overlooks the large communal garden.
There is a kitchenette with oven/microwave, mini fridge. There are no hot plates, but there is a kettle.
A small bathroom with walk-in shower, sink and toilet and shower products.
1 double

description:
Enjoy the bustling city life and relax in a green environment.

The city center is at walking distance, so you can explore the many excellent restaurants & bars, or have food delivered right at your door. Awarded "best bakery in Ghent", famous Hinkelspel cheese and other local merchandise is only 200m away so you can also use the kitchen if you like. You can enjoy a cozy park right around the corner, for a picknick or yoga.

Luxurious bathroom with walk-in shower & large bath.

Non-smokers only

The space
The appartment is part of a showroom, when not rented out, so it includes a lot of designer items.

description:
Cosy and warmly decorated gypsy wagon in our garden near a big park (Gentbrugse Meersen). A 25 min walk to the city center, a 2 min walk to the train station Gentbrugge and very close to bus stops. Supermarkets & bakery nearby.
Attention: the airbnb is in our garden. We share the garden, but you can enjoy some privacy on your own terrace.
There's a double bed for 2 people. There's a sink, a refrigerator and a microwave. In our house you have a private toilet and bathroom.

The space
In de woonwagen is er een dubbel bed aanwezig en een zetel.
Er is een tafeltje aanwezig met 2 stoelen.
De keuken is uitgerust met een frigo met kleine diepvries, een combimicrogolfoven, 2 kookplaatjes, bestek, glazen en borden zijn aanwezig en een wasbak met warm en koud water. Op aanvraag kan je zeker gebruik maken van de BBQ.
Voor de koffiedrinkers is er een koffiezetapparaat aanwezig (koffiepoeder moet je zelf meebrengen)
Wifi is aanwezig.
Een air

You will enjoy easy access to everything in Gent from this centrally located place. Nice comfortable double bed, shower room with toilet and fully equipped kitchen.

We also have two spare bikes to share with both rooms (not always available). They are a great way to explore the beautiful city!

In the back garden we have a sofa and BBQ which you're welcome to use too.

The city of Gent is beautiful and we don't get tired of it. Come and explore from our house and we promise a warm welcome.

description:
This beautiful accommodation is truly a wonderful location to stay at. Perfect to explore & enjoy the culture, history, energy & food of this amazing city but your good night sleep is also guaranteed!

Your own private and comfortable studio is on the 2 floor of our private home
The building is very centrally located: bus/tram stops nearby, several public car parks only minutes away, supermarket & groceries at less than 200 meters.

The space
This contemporary studio provides you with all the comfort you need: your own bathroom with shower, double bed, hairdryer, free WiFi, free city map and our own personal guide with all our favorite addresses. There is no kitchen but in the living area you have a microwave, fridge, and facilities for coffee and tea.
Just to be clear, the shower and the toilet are in the same space as the bedroom and living area but is separated by a curtain.

description:
Just 10 minutes from historic downtown Ghent. Our spacious modern house sleeps 6 people, features a large open seating area, kitchen and eating area. Garden with pond, terrace, outdoor table. Three bedrooms with the desired beds upon request. You are renting the complete house while we live abroad. Our house is just 10 minutes from historic downtown Ghent by car, tram (stop 500m) or bicycle. Free on street parking in front. Indoor (2) bicycle storage. We welcome children but no large pets.

The space
Living room: very spacious with 6 person couch. 77" TV with 7.1 Dolby Surround (no cable TV but Netflix, Amazon Prime Video and Disney+ available). View on garden, terrace and swimming pond (not heated). Living, kitchen and dining area are one big open space.

Kitchen: features a gas cooking plate, hot air oven, Nespresso Dolce Gusto, classic coffee machine, toaster, waterboiler, dishwasher.

Dining area: very large dining table seats 10 persons.

description:
Tussen de bomen, weg van de wereld.
En tóch in Gent.

Voor de mensen die de stad genegen zijn, en wie de drukte soms wat te veel wordt. Voor wie graag dicht bij huis vertoeft, en intens contact wil maken met de natuur. Voor zij die doorgaans van hot naar her hollen en eens even stil willen staan.

Welkom bij Unplugged Gent.
Welkom om te overnachten in een van onze mobiele hideaways.

--- De echte locatie wordt pas vijf dagen voorafgaand aan het verblijf meegedeeld ---

description:
We verwelkomen jullie graag in onze gezinswoning bij Gent en hopen dat jullie er een fijne tijd beleven! Voor jullie kinderen is er een groot aanbod aan speelgoed, zowel binnen als buiten (zandbak, trampoline, fietsen, ...).

3 rooms with double beds
Fully equipped kitchen with oven, microwave and dishwasher
City garden with bbq and some gym equipment
Living room with television and Netflix
Bathroom with rainshower
Free fast wifi
3 bicycles available
Close to bus and tram
Private garage closeby

The space
This cozy house, close to the city center of Ghent (2 km), has everything you need for a wonderful getaway with friends or family. On the ground floor you can find the living room with television and the kitchen with oven, microwave and dishwasher. There is a large city garden where you can enjoy a delicious barbecue (bbq available). On the first floor you can find the bathroom and two spacious bedrooms. Second floor is an office space with extra double bed. Three bicycles available. Free WiFi. Close to bus/ tram station. Included private garage closeby

Looking forward to be your host.

Edward

Verblijf in een gezellig ingericht rijhuis met stadstuin op een boogscheut van de kuip van Gent.

Cosy town house with lovely terrace and garden close to the historical center of Ghent.

The space
Dit ruime huis van 160m2 heeft een hele ruime woonruimte en eetplaats die uitgeven op een terras en tuin van 60m2. De keuken is volledig uitgerust met grote frigo, kookplaat, combi-oven, koffiezet. Guest access
De woning ligt in een rustige volksbuurt en is gemakkelijk te bereiken met de wagen en openbaar vervoer. In de straat kan je mits betaling (3€/dag) makkelijk je wagen parkeren.

description:
Genieten in het historische centrum van Gent, het Patershol.
Onze Airbnb ligt in het hartje van Gent. Overal dichtbij en zoveel te ontdekken. Gelukkig wonen we in een rustige straat, je hebt dus geen last van het nachtlawaai.

The space
De kamer bevindt zich op het gelijkvloers.

- Er is 1 groot tweepersoonsbed
- Wifi is gratis beschikbaar
- Er zijn geen kookfaciliteiten (= geen keuken/kookplaten/magnetron/oven)
- Een frigo is wel aanwezig

Guest access
De gehele onderverdieping is voor jullie dit houdt in, de kamer, badkamer
+ terras, de gang is gemeenschappelijk.

Other things to note
De airbnb is niet bereikbaar met de auto.
Gent = lage emissie zone.

Gratis de auto parkeren kan aan Dok-Noord. Dit is 15 minuten wandelen.

Betalend parkeren: wij raden de parking van de Vrijdagmarkt aan omdat deze dichterbij is. Deze is 4 minuten wandelen.

description:
Looking for a typical and cosy stay in Ghent?

This tiny house is a 19th Century accommodation located in one of the oldest "cité" (pedestrian area) of Ghent.

You are at walking distance from the city center (15 min) in a lively neighbourhood where you find shops, cafes and other amenities as well as the biggest natural park of the region.

The space
The house has a bedroom, a bathroom, an open living space with kitchen. The living space includes a sofabed.
Outside there is a nice open-air court, shared with 3 other similar houses that can be used for outdoor barbecues during summer or campfires during winter.

Guest access
The city center is at walking distance (15 min), reachable by bike (a nice ride next to the river) or by public transport (for example bus 3 is just across the street).

The main train station, Gent-sint-pieters, is reachable by Tram 4 (15 min) which stops 300 meters from the house.

description:

De slaapkamer is heel erg ruim en biedt voldoende comfort aan gasten, een tweepersoonsbed met middelharde matras, opbergruimte in de vorm van lades onder het bed, alsook een kledingrek. description:
Our beautiful studio is perfectly suited to discover Ghent, it is situated in the historic heart of Ghent, ideal to enjoy the cultural medieval city . The studio is quite small but very cozy! Within a 2 min walk, you have all the landmarks that Medieval Ghent has to offer; Graslei, Korenmarkt, the Castle of Counts, Saint Bavo's Cathedral, the Design museum and much more. You can also enjoy a cosy night inside, enjoying Netflix. The apartment is located about 150 meters from the underground park

The space
The studio is situated on the first floor and has 1 double bed a kitchenette and shower with lavatory.

Guest access
Guest access
The entire apartment is accessible to guests.

Other things to note
There are several underground parking’s nearby (closest one is called “Parking Sint-Michiels”).

description:
Enjoy a beautiful, cozy room with a spacious private bathroom located on the top floor of our home - a recently renovated 1960s house in a calm street. Our home is located near the Sint-Pieters train station and is at walking distance of the city center.

The space
The bedroom consists of a double bed (180 x 200 cm), a bench, a clothing rack, a Nespresso machine and a TV with Netflix (not seen on the pictures as it was added afterwards).
The bathroom is accessible via the hall and consists of a shower, a sink and a toilet.
Both rooms are located on the 3rd floor of our house. You will have to use the main entrance and main hall and stairs for access.
The hall and stairs are the only places that will be shared with us. On your floor, you have complete privacy.

The wide range of gastronomic delights, trendy shops and cultural highlights are at stone's throw. Welcome to Ghent!

The space
The garden house of 58 m2 has two stories. On the ground floor are the living area and equipped kitchen with dining space. Feel free to use the garden, it is stunning in spring time.

description:
Onze ruime woonwagen is een plaats van schoonheid en rust vlak bij het historische centrum van Gent. Perfect voor Glamping: prachtig ingericht met oog voor detail, alle basisvoorzieningen en een tikkeltje glamour. Je hebt het huisje op wielen helemaal voor jezelf. Het ligt verscholen tussen het groen achterin een sfeervolle stadstuin. Er is een klein terras. De zwemvijver en vuurplaats zijn niet privé, maar kunnen gebruikt worden op voorwaarde dat de rust rond het huis bewaard blijft.

The space
Als je houdt van gezelligheid, sfeer met een beetje bohémien zal je betoverd worden door deze bijzondere woonwagen. Verwacht je niet de luxe van een chique hotel en niet de stilte van een afgelegen bos, maar een unieke eigenzinnige plek in een rustige groene omgeving vlak bij een bruisende stad, dan ben je helemaal op de juiste plaats.

description:
In the middle of the Latem lakes and close to the Lys you will stay in an original, restored Flemish farmhouse where time stood still. You and your group have the entire house at your disposal. Rest, nature, gastronomy and culture are what you will find here. On the other hand, this is also the ideal base for exploring Sint-Martens-Latem, Ghent and the surrounding area, and for enjoying the peace and quiet in the evening.

The space
All rooms are tastefully decorated and equipped with all comforts to make your stay as pleasant as possible. You will notice that you will not lack for anything during your stay.

Guest access
At Rozina House there is a parking space for one vehicle. Other vehicles can park for free at the end of the street (200m away). There is a bus stop at the beginning of the street. The bus that goes in the direction of Ghent stops here. There is also a stop for the on-call bus in the street.

Een uitstraling van weleer in combinatie te midden van rust, natuur EN stad. Als onderdeel van het bedrijvencentrum UR.zone kan je genieten van de extra faciliteiten : centrale keuken, authentiek salon, buitenzwembad (zomer), tuin. Voel je welkom ! The space
Dit is de master bedroom in een directeurswoning. Ze kijkt uit op de riante tuin met (onverwarmd) zwembad. De kamer is uitgerust dubbel bed, tafel met stoelen, kasten, open haard (indien gewenst / apart aan te vragen). De badkamer (2 wastafels, bidet en bad) is vernieuwd en kijkt met een groot raam uit op de slaapkamer. Het toilet is nog old style. description:
Beautiful townhouse in the center of Ghent with a super cozy, green city garden. Stylishly decorated. Near the water, in the beautiful neighborhood 'De Visserij'. Easily accessible by public transport (bus stop in front of the door), near Ghent Dampoort station.

The townhouse has three bedrooms (each with its own bathroom and toilet).

You'll share the garden of our beautiful house with our three cats. They are very cute and used to people, they won't bother you at all!

The space
Complete house, available for 6 people.

On the ground floor you can find a big hallway, a toilet and access to the kitchen and the living room. The big glass door in the kitchen gives access to the garden. We have great internet (Telenet wifi!) and Netflix on the television. We have a cozy stove (you can find wood in the garden shed).

On the first floor there is a laundry room, a bathroom (bad, toilet, shower) and a bedroom (for 2).

The apartment has a sunny terrace, cosy living room, bedroom with double bed, fully equipped kitchen and bathroom. Public transport, bakery, shops and parc around the corner (50m). There are 2 folding bikes available (use at own responsibility).

The space
The roof top loft is located on the top floor (2nd) from the building. The ground floor and first floor locate an atelier and office.
You have the loft apartment completely for yourself (living area, bathroom, kitchen, bedroom, terrace).

There is no elevator in the building.
The apartment loft measures about 56 square meter.

Kom logeren en genieten in onze zeer lichtrijke loft/studio met alle comfort!

The space
De studio werd volledig eigenhandig gebouwd en werd twee jaar gebruikt als hoofdverblijfplaats tijdens de verbouwingen van de rest van het huis. Alles werd volledig vernieuwd in 2019 en voorzien van alle comfort.

Als je binnenkomt in de studio, kom je direct in de leefruimte met aansluitend de open keuken met eiland en barkrukjes. De keuken is volledig ingericht en voorzien van koelkast, vaatwas, microgolfoven, kookplaat, dampkap, oven, koffiemachine en talrijk keukengerei.

description:
A perfect place to start your discovery of the city. Both room and bathroom are very basic but there is a huge bed (180x200) and all basic comfort (heating, warm water, sink in the room,...)

There is (paid) parking near the house and bike rental options.

Although the house is located in a very vivid area of town, you can enjoy the peacefulness and quietness at all times as the rooms are located in the back of the house, with a view of the large garden.

The space
I'm a single mother of two (newborn twins) and currently renting out a part of the house to cover cost of the ongoing renovations of this 19th century house.

description:
Stay at the Airbnb of Theater Box.
The room is situated in a charming old townhouse at walking distance of the city centre.
There is a large bedroom, a private bathroom with bathtub and walk-in shower and a roof terrace. You also have access to the shared garden.
You can have breakfast in the room after reservation.

Guest access
From the Airbnb it's only a few minutes walk to the station Gent Dampoort.
If you want to park in the surrounding streets you have to pay (9 a.m. - 11 p.m.), except on Sundays and holidays. It costs 6 euros per day. There is also a big parking lot next to the station Gent Dampoort, but it is more expensive: 18 euros.
